name: Petals & Pots
description: Petals & Pots, a React-powered gardening app featuring a user-friendly interface for exploring indoor and outdoor plant libraries. The app includes personalized profiles, smart search functionality, and educational content, offering users a seamless and engaging experience in cultivating their green spaces.

name: Cart Quest
description: Cart Quest is a memory game where you must remember and repeat a sequence of grocery items. It keeps track of your wins and losses and offers increasingly challenging levels as you progress through the game. Messages are displayed to guide you, and buttons appear and disappear to control your interactions.

name: Portfolio
description: This portfolio showcases my skills, projects, and experiences as a Software Engineer.
